channel.title: Zamorak Nation | VPS | Bossing | Skilling
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pck86U5.jpg[/img] [u][i][b]Quick Join[/b][/i][/u] [b]Homepage/Webclient:[/b] http://zamoraknation.webs.com/ [b]Server:[/b] http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Zamorak%20Nation [i]We are in process of making a custom downloadable client. I will post link as soon as possible.[/i]
[b]Features[/b] There will be much features be added in the future. Right now, we do have already some really awesome features that other servers not have. They will be listed below;
- Custom Home - Custom Items - Vote Rewards - Donator Zone - Basic Hunter - 100% Duel Arena - 100% Pest Control - 100% Warrior Guild - 100% Party Room - Perfect Summoning - Perfect Player & NPC Clipping - Perfect Combat System - Autocast in Mage Book - Normal XP Rate - DDoS Server Protection - Encrypted Character Files(Protection) - Great Community Forum - No Lag At All - Playershare - Perfect Item Switching - Ofcourse 24/7 online ~ VPS
[i]We have much and much more features, just to much to list them up here. We can suggest just to take a look at our server and you will not regret it.[/i]
[b]Media[/b]
Custom Home [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ule3Nm1.jpg[/img]
Custom Training :) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qV1guJe.jpg[/img]
Donator Shop(Working God Bows) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OReWqOx.png[/img]
Working Dungeoneering [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CRC251I.jpg[/img]
[b]Much more screenshots and other media will follow later[/b].
[i][b]Server Information[/b][/i] [b]Homepage/Webclient:[/b] http://zamoraknation.webs.com/ [b]Server:[/b] http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Zamorak%20Nation [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Yc6HSBL.png[/img]
[b]End[/b] On behalf of the Zamorak Nation staff team, we really do hope that you will join! At least give it a chance. Our staff is always there to help you. And maybe, some day. You will become a part of the staff.[/center]

[center]

Quick Join
Homepage/Webclient: http://zamoraknation.webs.com/
Server: http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Zamorak%20Nation
We are in process of making a custom downloadable client. I will post link as soon as possible.

Features
There will be much features be added in the future. Right now, we do have already some really awesome features that other servers not have.
They will be listed below;

  • Custom Home
  • Custom Items
  • Vote Rewards
  • Donator Zone
  • Basic Hunter
  • 100% Duel Arena
  • 100% Pest Control
  • 100% Warrior Guild
  • 100% Party Room
  • Perfect Summoning
  • Perfect Player & NPC Clipping
  • Perfect Combat System
  • Autocast in Mage Book
  • Normal XP Rate
  • DDoS Server Protection
  • Encrypted Character Files(Protection)
  • Great Community Forum
  • No Lag At All
  • Playershare
  • Perfect Item Switching
  • Ofcourse 24/7 online ~ VPS

We have much and much more features, just to much to list them up here. We can suggest just to take a look at our server and you will not regret it.
